queries.query: select count(t1.p1) as v1 from (select distinct(p.patient_hid) as p1 from patient p join observation o on p.patient_hid = o.patient_hid join encounter e on o.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where p.gender = 'F' and o.concept_id =  ':pncGivenWithin48HoursUUID:' and o.value = 'true' and date(o.datetime) between date(':paramStartDate:') and date(':paramEndDate:') and e.facility_id=':paramFacilityId:') as t1, (select distinct(p.patient_hid) as p2 from patient p join observation o on p.patient_hid = o.patient_hid join encounter e on o.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where p.gender = 'F' and o.concept_id =  ':newBornCare:' and date(o.datetime) between date(':paramStartDate:') and date(':paramEndDate:') and e.facility_id=':paramFacilityId:') as t2 where t1.p1 = t2.p2;

select count(distinct(p.patient_hid)) as v1 from patient p join observation o on p.patient_hid = o.patient_hid join encounter e on o.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where p.gender = 'F' and o.concept_id =  ':newBornCare:' and date(o.datetime) between date(':paramStartDate:') and date(':paramEndDate:') and e.facility_id=':paramFacilityId:';
